comment: A "C" is "meets expectations" in her grading world. She is very unclear with what she expects out of assignments and is really unprepared. I was looking forward to taking IS3100 and now I wish I had taken it with someone else.
Good Teacher Fair had her for it3700
Buy Workbook ONLY, Never used the textbook. Fairly easy class. Lets you use cheat sheet on test.

Im almost positive that she knew very little about Web Development. I took it as a summer course and she would basically teach us HTML straight from the book and would tell us to type what she did. She never explained what we were typing and would always need us to find her errors. Easy A though. So if you dont care about learning much. TAKE HER!
SHe is a sweet lady. Helpful and understanding. A little slow on grading. I like the fact that we hade many grades and that many assigments were done in class, so she could help.
